div.p:
vndecimo die mensis marcij anno quo supra Andreas muresone obligavit se
heredes suos executores et assignatos fide media in trisdecim libris et tribus
Solidis monete scocie pro certis mercanciis ab eo emptis et receptis Jacobo
Colisone Soluend' dimidij in festo Corporis christi et aliud dimidium in festo
Ad uincula Sancti petri proximo futuro Et si deficerit Soluet lanam pro vij
s' quamlibet petram fraude et dolo Semotis coram testibus Andrea Culan
Juniore et Duncano Colisone

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xj die
mensis marcij anno quo supra

the saide day Dauid Spens grantit him dettour to Androw branche
bailye for xix s' for mastir Alexander Dauisone quhilkis he grantit to
pay to the saide Androw
Curia balliuorum de Abirdene xiij die mensis marcij anno quo supra

the saide day Jonhne Wormet grauntit that he tuk the cabille with the
fischingis this yer bigane fra Jonhne moir'

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xv die
mensis marcij anno quo supra

The saide day Cornelys was in ane Amerciament of the court be
ane Suorne assis' for the wranguis' strubulance of Robert pipar
be ane Suorne assis' sere Jonhne ruthirfurd forspekar And als' for
the dissobeinge of the officiaris and to amend as law wil and
forber' in tyme to Cum

the saide day Copin and henrik Yansone flemyngis was conuikit
be the saide assis' for dissobeinge of the officiaris Ande yane
ande gareat flemyngis was conuictit for art part fortefeinge and
mantening of the saide iij personis in dissobeinge the officiaris
and to Amend as law will and forber' in tyme to Cum

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvjo die mensis
marcij anno quo supra

the saide day the aldirman with avis' of the Consale ordanit the officiaris
to warne and charge thomas fyf alssone as thai coud' comprehend him
to Comper one the morne thareftir befor tham and the balyeis to ansuer' anent
the frethin and releving' of Alexander chamer Jonhne menyes and vthiris balyeis for the
tyme of xlti s' of ane vnlaw of the Justice ayr

the saide day Jonhne Wormet allegit that he hed takin the Cobile clamit
be Jonhne moir' fra thame that hed pouer' to hir' hyr and his previs
was beyond fortht tharfor the aldirman and balyeis eftir the tenour of
the deliuerance of ane assis' assignit the law day eftir pasche to
the saide Jonhne Wormet to preyve his said allegeance

the saide day Jonhne moir' protestit Solempnitlie for the costis
Skathis ande expensis that happinnis to Sustene throw want
of the said cobill gif scho beis maid' hisThis court is probably continued on page 621.

Burgenses et fratres gilde tempore prepositure Dauid menyes
Anno Domini millesimo quadringentesimo nonagesimo quarto

georgius gordone recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde Jure paternitatis
prestito Solito Juramento et solut' v s' in alba bursa
magister Alexander gordone iure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito Juramento

gilbertus patersone iure paternitatis recipitur in liberum et fratrem gilde prestito
Solito Juramento et Solut' v s' in alba bursa

Johannes Wyslie recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde ad Instanciam domini
Johannis Srachin prestito Solito Juramento

Johannes Arthour' recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestit Solito Juramento
et Solut' xxtj s'

Willelmus Smytht recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito
Solito Juramento et Solut'

Dauid fynne recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde presito solito
Juramento et Solut' xxtj s'
Dauid club racione paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem prestito Solito Juramento
Alexander michelsone recipitur in liberum burgensem iure paterno prestito solito Juramento

Dauid mathesone recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde quia sponsavit filiam
burgensis prestito Solito Juramento et solut' v s' in alba bursa

Willelmus Abirdene recipitur in liberum burgensem racione paternitatis prestito Solito Juramento
et Solut' v s' in alba bursa
Thomas Dauisone ad instanciam Andree elphinstone recipitur in liberum burgensem
Johannes bane recipitur in liberum burgensem

Willelmus serray recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito Solito
Juramento et solut' xviij s'

Johannes terres recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito solito Juramento
et solut' v s'

Duncanus Colysone Jure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem et
fratrem gilde Solut' quinque x' et in alba bursa et prestito Solito Juramento

Dauid tailyour' ad Instanciam Comitis marescalli recipitur in liberum
burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito Solito Juramento

Willelmus Donaldsone recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde ad Instanciam
officialis Abirdonensis et Camerarij domini nostri Episcopi prestito Solito Juramento
Alexander Williamsone textor recipitur in liberum burgensem prestito Solito Juramento

the saidThis is probably the continuation of the court on page 618. the aldirman and balyeis assignit this day xv dais to Johne
Wormet to ansuer to the borghe' Strekit one him for the wrang
wis' haldin of xij s' fra Jonhne moir' but langar process'

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem 3o die aprilis
Anno Domini Millesimo quadringentesimo nonagesimo quinto

the saide day Dauid Kintor allegit he coud' get nay marrowschip
to streik with him and his thridparte of nethis apone the wattir of
Done tharfor he Solempnitlie protestit for his fische and for his
Skathis costis and expensis

Eodem die thomas Kenyeoche conuictus fuit per assisam per perturbio
Johannis mathesone et coniugis sue Ac pro perturbio Johannis menyes
ballivi quibus emendabit ut Jura volunt Ac Soluet j li' cere
ad lumen Sancti Sanguinis Et si conuictus fuerit In postrum pro
perturbio alicuius officiarj Soluet fabrice ecclesie decim s'

add.foreign: taxtores ad extendum summam ijc li' ad dandum contribucionem S domino nostro Regi ad exitum ad Insulas

div.p:
The ferde day of aprile the yer' forsaide thir personis vndirwritin
Alexander chamer of murchile Alexander menyeis' Robert blinsele thomas prat
Jonhne Colisone Androw murray eldar Williame futhes Dauid mathe
sone and William andirsone eldar was chosin and Suorne the gret bodily aithe
be the haill consale and communite of the said burghe warnit be the handebell
throw the haile toune and gathreit for the tyme taxtouris to taxt ande
extent the Some of tua hundreth pundis to be gevin in contribucion
to our Souerane lordis hienes to the furnisinge of Schippis and
mene to the passage in Inglis Yrlande for the comprehensione of
his rebelleis and evile disposit di personis that ar' fugitiwe fra
his lawis

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem x die mensis
aprilis anno quo supra

add.foreign: penes peccuniam datam et accomodatam ad constructionem chori Abirdonensis

div.p:
The saide day certane personis vndir writin of thar' avne fre
will has lent and deliuerit this money eftir follouing to pay
Jonhne faidouris for the making' of the ruff and tymmir of the queyr and
the money resavit fra the personis that happinis to haue takis of the tone at the next
assedacion salbe allocat in thar girsoms' And the personis that gettis nay takis
sal haue thar money of the haill tone at the fest of Sanct Androw
in winter next hereftir thir ar the personis In the first lent be Alexander chamer eldar xl s'
Robert blinsel xl s' Androw murray eldar xl s' Alexander chamer the sone xl s'
Androw Cullan yongar xl s' David adamsone xx s' Dauid Spens xx s' philp
Dunbrek xviij s' Johne thomsone xx s' patrik leslie xxiij s' iiij d' William
nicholsone xx s' David mathesone xl s' John Wormet xl s' Androw branche
xxxvj s' Robert Crage xl s' William gareache eldar xx s' William andirson'
eldar xx s' thome leslie xx s' Androw ancroft xx s' James Craik xx s' John
menyeis xxvj s' viij d' Androw Cullan eldar xviij s' Richard hil yongar xxiij s' iiij d'
John grige thre li' Alexander nachty x s' Alexander gray xl s' William Wormet xx s'
thome Waus xx s' John retre xxx s' Alexander mathesone xx s' Alexander menyeis
xl s' John Culan xl s' bessy blinsele xx s' Richard' hil eldar xl s' Richard' Waus xx s'
patrik chernsid' xx s' John moir' xx s' Will goldsmith xx s' Alexander mar' xl s'
george bysset xl s' Duncan Colison' xxtj s' Robert Cullan xx s' James Colison' xx s'
Allan litstar xx s' John Waus xx s' Summa huius lxij li' v s' et iiij d'

James be the grace of gode Kinge of Scottis Tile our louet Richarde
macdwele maser our serref in that part specialie constitut fforsamekle
as now of late our trast cosing ande chancellar' Archibalde erle of Anguse
passit and our' name componit ande appointis with the provestis Aldirmene
bailyeis and communitez of our burrowis vidir vndir
vrittin for thir Svmez of money
eftir follouing to be Inbroche and pait to ws be thame siclik as vthris
the prelatis baronis and burrouis of our Realme dois for expedicion' of gret
materis concerning ws the commone weile of our Realme and liegis in gret nernes'
that is to say our' burghe of Abirdene tua hundrethe pundis montrose fyfty
pundis Dunde tua hundrethe and fyfty pundis brechein xxx li' forfair'
xx merkis Abirbrothoc xxx li' Pertht jc fyfty li' couper fyfty li'
Ande the Ciete of SanctAndrois vjc li' Our will Is her'for and we
charge youe stratlie and commandis that ye in continent thir our lettres seyne pas'
to ale the saidez burrouis ciete and townis Abone writtin Ande in our'
nayme and Autorite command' and charge the provestis Aldermen bailyeis and communitez
of the samyn that thaj in continent thankfully pay ande deliuer to yone in our' name'
the somez of money aboue writin Ilk tovne for thar awne parte lik
as thaj promittit to our saide chancellar' one our' behalf' tobe Inbroche be
youe to ws to the effect aboue writin Ande failyeing of the pament
of the saidez Somez promittit be thame as saide that ye Recognis in our
handis the fredomez of the saidez burrouis and ciete chargeing the communitez
and Inhabitantis tharof that thaj wys' nay thing belanging the fredome of
the samyne or Recognicion' standing tharapone Ande quhile the saidez
Somez be pait vndir ale the hiest pane and charge that eftir mycht folloue
Ande thir our lettres be yow deuly execut and Indorsit bringis thame to giddir
with the saide somez to ws gevin vndir our Signet at Edinburghe the
xxix day of marche Ande of our Regnne the Sevint yer'

The saide day Anthonius laurence procurator to the relict of Arnalde
Wanstakinburghe and to the tutoris of his barnes grantit him avand
to Dauid mathesone xvj s' g' Squair' money aucht be the
vmquhile the said Arnald' quhilkis he oblist him be the fatht' of his bodie
to be payt within ane yer' to the saide day his ayris executouris or
assignais

vicesimo Septimo
Curia Capitalis burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxvijo
die mensis aprilis anno Domini et cetera nonagesimo quinto quo die Sectis
vocatis et Curia affirmata absentes patent in Rotulo Sectarum

Eodem die accedens ad barram dominus Andreas gray procurator domini Roberti
Waus capellanj altaris beate marie magdalene infra ecclesiam Sancti nicho
laij de Abirdene situati et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo Red
ditu xxti s' sibi et dicto altari annuatim debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico
nauium ex australi parte eiusdem vici inter terram Johannis blak ex orientali ex
vna et terram patricij andirsone ex occidentali partibus ab altera ad quam terram acce
dens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo
presentavit in Curia tanquam tercio die huius processus Testibus marco Scot
Willelmo mornys et henrico horvm seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram dominus matheus nichelsone Collector
ac procurator capellanorum Collegij de Abirdene et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno
annuo Redditu quinque solidorum dictis capellanis annuatim debito de quodam antiquo
horreo quondam thome culane Jacente ex occi'cci' overwrites 'rie'.dentali parte vie regie qua Itur
ad le bolbrige inter terram olim Johannis gothresone ex australi et Croftum
fratrum predicatorum boreali Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter
terram et lapides quos ballivis in Sacculo presentavit in curia tanquam
tercio die huius processus Testibus Willlelmo blicht Juniore Ricardo baxtar et thoma Jameson seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram dominus matheus nicholsone collector ac procurator
capellanorum collegij de Abirdene et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo Red
ditu quatuor s' et quatuor d' dictis capellanis annuatim debit' de quadam terra
vasta Jacente in vico viridi inter terram quondam Roberti Club ex australi et
torrentem ex boreali et Riuolum a lacu distenden' versus occidens Ad quam
terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis
in Sacculo presentavit in curia tanquam seriando die huius processus Testibus Willelmo blitht
Juniore Richardo baxtar et thoma Jamesone seriando

Eodem die Accedens ad barram Religiosus vir frater Andreas liel
prior ac procurator conuentus fratrum carmelitarum de Abirdene et protestatus fuit in forma
Juris pro vno annuo Redditu quadraginta denariorum sibi et dictis fratribus
annuatim debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico viridi inter terram quondam
Roberti Club ex australi et torrentem ex boreali et riuolum a lacu distenden'
versus occidens Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et
lapides quos ballivis in Sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam secundo die huius
processus testibus Willelmo blicht Juniore Ricardo baxtar et thoma Jamesone seriando

head.add: procurator domine de barnis pro filio suo domino de barnis

div.p:
Eodem die accedens ad barram patricius leslie procurator domine de barnis quj
protestatus fuit in forma iuris pro vno annuo Redditu quatuor solidorum
et Sex d' domino de barnis annuatim debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico
viridi inter terram R quondam Roberti club ex australi et torrentem ex boreali et
Riuolum a lacu distenden' versus occidens Ad quam terram accedens nichil
reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in Sacculo presentauit
in curia tanquam secundo die huius processus Testibus Willelmo buchane Johanne lammyntone
et henrico horum seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram patricius leslie procurator domini de barnis quj protestatus
fuit in forma iuris pro vno annuo redditu quinque s' domino de barnis annuatim debit' de
quadam terra vasta Jacente in le futy inter terram andree murray Judicatoris ex
ex australi ex vna et terram quondam thome broysour' ex boreali partibus ab altera
Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos
ballivis in Sacculo presentavit in curia tanquam secundo die huius processus Testibus
Willelmo buchan Johanne lammyngtone et henrico horum seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram Wilelmus buchan et protestatus fuit in
forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu s' scocie annuatim debit' de
quadam terra vasta Jacente in le futy inter

Eodem die Accedens ad barram Religiosus vir frater David andirson prior ac procurator
domus fratrum predicatorum dicti burgi et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu octo s' annuatim sibi et
dictis fratribus debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico furcarum ex orientali parte eiusdem
vici inter terram magistri Alexandri Cullan Rectoris de Oyne ex australi ex vna et terram Robertj
Cullan ex boreali partibus ab altera et communiones vias regias versus oriens et occidens
Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos balliuis
in sacculo presentavit in curia tanquam tercio die huius processus testibus Andrea Waus Johanne
Scot et Andrea nachtj sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad barram philippus Dunbrek procurator
Agnetis alisone liall et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu
Sex s' et octo d' sibi annuatim debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente infra
dictum burgum in vico Superiori ecclesie ex australi parte eiusdem vici inter
terram quondam thome Waus ex orientali ex vna et terram henrici tulidef
ex occidentali partibus ab altera Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter
terram et lapides quos ballivis in Sacculo presentavit in curia tanquam
primo die huius processus Testibus Willelmo blicht Juniore Ricardo baxtar'
et thoma Jamesone seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus Andreas hen
rici capellanus altaris beati nicholaij de Abirdene et protestatus fuit in
forma Juris pro vno annuo Redditu trium s' sibi tanquam capellano
et procuratori dicti altaris de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico
furcarum ex occidentali parte eiusdem vici inter terram Johannis Cullane ex australi
ex vna et terram Johannis Colisone ex boreali partibus ab altera Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit
distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in Sacculo presentauit
in curia tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus Andrea Waus Johanne
Scot et Andrea nachty seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram Religiosus vir frater Dauid'
prior domus fratrum predicatorum huius burgi et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro
vno annuo redditu sex s' et octo d' annuatim dictis fratribus debit' de quadam
terra vasta Jacente in vico Superiori ecclesie inter terram thome prat
ex orientali et terram thome mar ex australi et communiones vias
regias versus boriam et occidens Ad quam terram accedens nichil
reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo
presentauit in Curia tanquam tercio die huius processus Testibus
Andrea Waus Johanne Scot et Andrea nachtj seriando

Eodem die Accedens ad barram religiosus vir frater Dauid andirsone
prior domus fratrum predicatorum huius burgi et protestatus fuit in
forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu sex s' sibi et dictis
fratribus annuatim debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico
furcarum ex Orientali parte eiusdem vici inter terram quodam Ricardi
Kintor ex australi ex vna et terram Capellani altarie
Sancti petrj ex boreali partibus ab altera Ad quam terram accedens
nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis
in Sacculo presentavit in Curia tanquam tercio die huius processus
Testibus Andrea Waus Johanne Scot et Andrea nachtj seriando

The saide day Agnes Club the Spous' of vmquhile
Thomas Cullane Solempnitlie protestit for remede of law that
quhat thinge Androw Cullane eldar and Alexander Rede his forspekar
dide or causit to be done anent the berne and croft pertening to hir'
be resone of coniunctfeftment throw deces' of his' said Spous'
suld' turne hir to nay preiudice

Eodem die accedens ad barram Andreas murray Junior burgensis
dicti burgi et protestat
Eodem die perlectis tribus processibus per Andream murray Juniorem
deductis de et super recuperacione proprietatis et possessionis cuiusdam terre vaste
Jacentis in vico nauium ex orientali parte eiusdem vici inter terram altaris
Sancti Sebastianj Stephanj ex Australi ex vna et terram Andree branche
ex boreali partibus ab altera in defectu solucionis vnius annuj redditus
Sex s' et octo d' sibj a longo tempore debit' et non solut' vnde dictus
Andreas peciit a ballivis secundum formam suj processus precedentis Juris
et Justicie Complementum Tunc Curia mature auisiata decreuit
quod dictus Andreas proprietatem et possessionem dicte terre legittime recuperauit in defectu
solucionis dicti annuj redditus Et hoc ex ore Johannis Williamsone
Judicatoris curie datum fuit pro Judicio Teste Curia Infrascripta dictus
Andreas peciit Instrumentum presentibus Alexandro chamer de murchill Alexandro menyeis
Alexandro Red Johanne Wormet patricio leslie Willelmo Kintor
gilberto gareauche et henrico orvm seriando

Eodem die Accedens ad barram Dauid prat et protestatus fuit in
forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu sibi annuatim debit'
de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico nauium ex orientali parte eiusdem
inter terram altaris sancti Stephani ex australi ex vna et terram
Andree branche ex boreali partibus ab altera Ad quam terram accedens
nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo
presentauit in Curia tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus Willelmo
rolland Dauid' Club et philippo Dunbrek seriando

The saide day Johne of lammyngtone falyeit in his preywe
of Adam brovnis obligacione as day assignit to him to
preywe his obligacione pait

Eodem die accedens ab barram Johannes Scherar' et protestatus fuit
in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu xiiij s' sibi annuatim
debit' de quadam vasta terra Jacente ad finem orientali vie castrij
inter terram gilbertj communionem regiam ex orientali et montem castrj ex australi Ad quam terram accedens in reperit distringibile preter terram et
lapides quos ballivis in Sacculo presentavit in curia tanquam primo die huius
processus Testibus gilberto gareauche Willelmo blicht et thoma Jamesone seriando
